title: 服务端报错！求解决！
author: ESCesc
txt_content: 08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.consumer.Consumer.run(Consumer.java:48)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.consumer.Process.processConsumer(Process.java:50)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.database.Database.prepareStatement(Database.java:232)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.database.Database.prepareStatement(Database.java:205)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:383)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:399)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:404)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.PrepStmt.<init>(PrepStmt.java:42)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.prepare(DB.java:123)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.NativeDB.prepare(Native Method)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.throwex(DB.java:374)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:387)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:383)08.02 17:43:15 [Server] WARN java.sql.SQLException: [SQLITE_ERROR] SQL error or missing database (no such table: co_block)

replies.author: volta薯片~
replies.txt_content:
数据库的问题，如果是BC的话去查看相关的设置
如果不是去看登录插件（应该没有这个问题吧）
